title: AIMO Standard - Root
description: Root schema for AIMO evidence bundles. See docs/standard/current/ for full specification.

taxonomy_version.description: Version of the taxonomy dictionary used (SemVer)

request.description: Optional request (application) record; id, timestamp, actor/role, scope, rationale recommended

review.description: Optional review/approval record; id, timestamp, actor/role, decision, references recommended

exception.description: Optional exception record; id, timestamp, scope, expiry, compensating controls, renewal ref recommended

renewal.description: Optional renewal/re-evaluation record; id, timestamp, actor/role, decision, references recommended

change_log.description: Optional change log or reference; id, timestamp, actor, change description, references recommended
